definitions.title: n. pr. div.
definitions.body: Assyr. god, worshipped by Sennach., 2Ki 19:37 = Is 37:38; LXX Esdrax, A Esqrax, LXXL Asrax(K); LXX Nasarax, [[א]] Asarak, A Asarax (Is); Jos:Ant. x. 1, 5 Araskh; no such god in cuneif. inscr.; see views in Meinh:Jesaiaerzählungen (1898) ad loc.; crpt. form of Nusku (= [[נסוך]]) acc. to Hal:JAs. xiii (1879), 387 = Mêl. de. Crit. 177 Muss-Arnolt:JBL xi.1 (1892), 86; Hbr. vii. 89 R. 17; Nusku is a solar diety, cf. Jastr:Rel. Bab. 220 f.
